belongs_to_collection.name: Suit Yourself or Shoot Yourself Collection

original_title: 勝手にしやがれ!!　脱出計画
overview: Hapless gangsters are hired by the yakuza to tail his daughter. Once the identity of the boy she's dating has been unveiled, the boss offers a reward for his capture.
title: Suit Yourself or Shoot Yourself!! The Escape
